articles.author: International Centre for Radio Astronomy Research (ICRAR)
articles.title: Advanced radio telescope technology 'sifts' space for mysteries - Phys.org
articles.description: The first trial of an Australian-developed technology has detected mysterious objects by sifting through signals from space like sand on a beach.
articles.content:
The first trial of an Australian-developed technology has detected mysterious objects by sifting through signals from space like sand on a beach.

articles.title: New FPGA-powered retro console re-creates the PlayStation One, CD-ROM drive optional - Ars Technica
